about.hero_subtitle: Discover the passion and purpose behind every Guzel piece.
about.story_text_1: Guzel was born from a simple belief: fashion should be beautiful, ethical, and accessible. Founded in 2021, we started with a vision to create clothing that celebrates the modern woman while respecting our planet.
about.story_text_2: We carefully curate every piece in our collection, working directly with suppliers who share our commitment to quality and sustainability. From fabric selection to the final stitch, every decision is made with intention.
about.story_text_3: Today, Guzel has grown into a community of women who value quality over quantity, and meaning over trends. We're proud to be part of your wardrobe and your journey.
about.value_sustainability_text: We use responsibly sourced fabrics and partner with ethical manufacturers to minimize our environmental footprint.
about.value_quality_text: Every piece is designed to last â€” from the stitching to the fabric selection, we never compromise on quality.
about.value_inclusive_text: Fashion should celebrate every woman. Our collections are designed with diversity and inclusivity at their core.
about.founder_quote: Fashion is a form of self-expression. We believe every woman deserves pieces that make her feel confident, beautiful, and true to herself.
about.cta_text: Discover our curated collection of timeless pieces designed for the modern woman.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a question or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.faq_1_a: We offer free standard shipping on all orders over $150. Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping (1-2 business days) is available for $15. International shipping rates vary by destination and are calculated at checkout.
contact.faq_2_a: We accept returns within 30 days of delivery for unworn items in original condition with tags attached. Returns are free for domestic orders. Exchanges can be made for different sizes or colors, subject to availability.
contact.faq_3_q: How do I know my size?
contact.faq_3_a: We offer a detailed size guide on each product page. For specific questions about fit, feel free to contact our customer service team. We also offer exchanges at no extra cost if you need to adjust your size.
contact.faq_4_a: Yes! Guzel gift cards are available in denominations from $25 to $500. They can be purchased directly on our website and sent digitally to your recipient. Gift cards never expire.
contact.faq_5_q: Are you available for wholesale orders?
contact.faq_5_a: We are interested in wholesale partnerships with boutiques, retailers, and organizations. Please reach out using the "Wholesale" option in our contact form and we will be happy to discuss opportunities.
